experiences.description:
- Conducted data processing tasks using SQL, including the development of SQL queries to calculate various statistical features.
- Applied clustering algorithms like K-means to label initially unlabelled data.
- Utilized multiple classification algorithms, including KNN, SVM, Artificial Neural Networks, and Autoencoders, for classifying types of rolling defects. Evaluated the models using the Scikit-learn and Keras libraries.
